newsitem.title: CHINA: China interbank market rates (CHIBOR) mostly down.
newsitem.headline: China interbank market rates (CHIBOR) mostly down.

text.p: Following is the China Interbank Offered Rate (CHIBOR) for Friday, issued by the official Xinhua news agency on behalf of the People's Bank of China, the central bank.
The figures represent weighted averages and not closing prices and they are annual percentage rates.
The central bank does not post volumes.
Traders said the market rates were depressed by the news that the People's Bank of China, the central bank, had cut bank interest rates as from today.
"But the news had partly been digested by the market, with rumours of the cut circulating for a few days," one trader said. "So the rates did not fluctuate sharply today."
Traders expect rates to move slightly down in the short term.
